name: Lyrics
description: Lyrics plugin that downloads lyrics from lrclib.net with configurable search options
overview: Lyrics plugin with configurable search options and automatic library scanning

versions.changelog:
## v1.0.0.0
### What's New
- Initial release for Jellyfin 10.10
- Lyrics plugin with configurable search options
- Automatic library scanning for lyrics

### Features
- Downloads lyrics from lrclib.net
- Configurable search options
- Scheduled task for downloading missing lyrics
